DOC.brief_summary: Insulin resistance important implication pathogenesis polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) insulin-sensitizing drug consider useful therapeutic approach . Reduction insulin level administration insulin sensitize agent find beneficial lowering hyperinsulinemia , hyperandrogenemia , restore ovulation . Metformin alone combination oral contraceptive ( OCs ) widely use long term treatment woman PCOS modifies ovarian morphology , improve intraovarian androgen level , enhances systemic local insulin resistance . Despite beneficial effect , several side effect report due long term administration drug . In recent year , inositol find space reproductive clinical practice . Indeed , inositol classify `` insulin sensitizing agent '' mainly use chronic treatment PCOS . Inositol exist 9 different isomer particular several study Myo-inositol D-chiro-inositol report . In study myo-inositol versus D-chiro-inositol treatment compare placebo woman PCOS without insulin resistance .
DOC.brief_title: Myo-inositol Versus D-chiro-inositol Treatment Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Insulin Resistance : Evaluation Clinical , Metabolic , Endocrine Ultrasound Parameters
